languages.text: "...непросто было осознать свою власть. Ведь я — не просто ткач. Я — лучшая из них. Избранная. В моей воле устанавливать правила, потому что я достаточно сильна, чтобы удержаться на нити Паутины без наставлений того, кто уже с Неумирающим!"

traits.locale_text: "О, мне понадобилось время, чтобы осознать всю свою власть... ведь я — не просто культистка смерти. Я — лучшая из них. Избранная. Предводительница Кровавой паутины! В моей воле менять законы и устанавливать правила — потому что я достаточно сильна, чтобы удержаться на стезе Анн'Шини без нелепых наставлений, чей создатель уже встретил свою долгожданную смерть!" {n}Кибелла бросает в вашу сторону взгляд.{/n} "И потому что я — избранница Вольного Торговца. Но хватит ли {mf|ему|ей} сил и ловкости, чтобы поймать меня?"

languages.text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"
languages.original_text: "...непросто было осознать свою власть. Ведь я — не просто ткач. Я — лучшая из них. Избранная. В моей воле устанавливать правила, потому что я достаточно сильна, чтобы удержаться на нити Паутины без наставлений того, кто уже с Неумирающим!"

traits.locale_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere weaver. I am the best among them. The chosen one. I have the right and will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to tread the Way without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

"It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere weaver. I am the best among them. The chosen one. I have the right and will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to tread the Way without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

"It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere weaver: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to tread the Way without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

"It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

"It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

languages.text: «Fue difícil ver por fin el poder que poseía. No soy una mera tejedora: soy la mejor, la elegida. Tengo el derecho y la voluntad de imponer las reglas. ¡Soy lo bastante fuerte como para recorrer la Red sin la guía de quien ya se ha unido al Inmortal!».
languages.original_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

traits.locale_text: «Fue difícil ver por fin el poder que poseía. No soy una mera tejedora: soy la mejor, la elegida. Tengo el derecho y la voluntad de imponer las reglas. ¡Soy lo bastante fuerte como para recorrer la Red sin la guía de quien ya se ha unido al Inmortal!».

languages.text: 「自分が手にしている力をようやく目にするのは、苦難の連続だった。私はただの織り手ではない。私は選ばれた、最高位の織り手。私には規則を定める権利とその意思がある。私はすでに不死の者の元に侍っている者に啓発されることはなく、ウェブの上を歩むのに十分な強さを持っている！」
languages.original_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

traits.locale_text: 「自分が手にしている力をようやく目にするのは、苦難の連続だった。私はただの織り手ではない。私は選ばれた、最高位の織り手。私には規則を定める権利とその意思がある。私はすでに不死の者の元に侍っている者に啓発されることはなく、ウェブの上を歩むのに十分な強さを持っている！」

languages.text: “经过了漫长的挣扎，我终于看到了我手中的力量。我不仅仅是普通的织网者，我是最出色的织网者，我是被选中的人。我有权利，有力量，可以制定我自己的规则。他已经与不死之神相见，而我已经足够强大。哪怕不再遵循他的教诲，我也一样能在罗网之中徜徉！”
languages.original_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

traits.locale_text: “经过了漫长的挣扎，我终于看到了我手中的力量。我不仅仅是普通的织网者，我是最出色的织网者，我是被选中的人。我有权利，有力量，可以制定我自己的规则。他已经与不死之神相见，而我已经足够强大。哪怕不再遵循他的教诲，我也一样能在罗网之中徜徉！”

languages.text: "Es war ein Kampf, endlich die Macht in meinen Händen zu erkennen. Ich bin keine einfache Spinnerin: Ich bin die beste von ihnen, die Auserwählte. Ich habe das Recht und den Willen, die Regeln zu bestimmen. Ich bin stark genug, auf dem Netz zu laufen, ohne von ihm moralisch aufgebaut zu werden, der sich bereits dem Todlosen angeschlossen hat!"
languages.original_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

traits.locale_text: "Es war ein Kampf, endlich die Macht in meinen Händen zu erkennen. Ich bin keine einfache Spinnerin: Ich bin die beste von ihnen, die Auserwählte. Ich habe das Recht und den Willen, die Regeln zu bestimmen. Ich bin stark genug, auf dem Netz zu laufen, ohne von ihm moralisch aufgebaut zu werden, der sich bereits dem Todlosen angeschlossen hat!"

languages.text: « Ça n'a pas été facile de prendre enfin conscience du pouvoir que j'ai entre les mains. Plus qu'une simple tisseuse, je suis la meilleure, l'élue. J'ai le droit et la volonté de dicter ma loi. Je suis assez forte pour suivre la toile sans avoir besoin des enseignements de celui qui a déjà rejoint l'Immortel ! »
languages.original_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

traits.locale_text: « Ça n'a pas été facile de prendre enfin conscience du pouvoir que j'ai entre les mains. Plus qu'une simple tisseuse, je suis la meilleure, l'élue. J'ai le droit et la volonté de dicter ma loi. Je suis assez forte pour suivre la toile sans avoir besoin des enseignements de celui qui a déjà rejoint l'Immortel ! »

languages.original_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"

languages.text: "Avuçlarımda tuttuğum gücü en nihayetinde görebilmek çok zahmetli oldu. Ben sıradan bir dokur değilim. Dokurlar arasında en iyisiyim, seçilmiş olanım. Kuralları belirleme hakkına da iradesine de sahibim. Hâlihazırda Ölmeyen'e katılanların öğretilerinden bağımsız bir şekilde Ağ'da yürüyecek kadar kuvvetliyim."
languages.original_text: "It was a struggle to finally see the power I hold in my hands. I am no mere spinner: I am the best of them, the chosen one. I have the right and the will to lay down the rules. I am strong enough to walk upon the Web without being edified by he who has already joined the Undying One!"
